search.query: | loadjob $jobid$ | where IS_AW_OUT=1 AND (IS_REF=0 AND IS_VE=0) AND testStand_iL="$testStand$" AND shortResultName="$resultName$" | eval outlierRange=outlierUg + " ≤ Δ ≤ " + outlierOg, outlierLimitMax=cnt_AW_Rama-outlierAwLimit, outlierOverall=outlierAwCntUG+outlierAwCntOG | table testStand_iL shortVIN wheelAlignmentCode shortResultName outlierAwL cnt_AW_Linie outlierR cnt_AW_Rama outlierAwDiff outlierAwValues outlierAwDiffValues outlierRange outlierAwCntUG outlierAwCntOG outlierOverall outlierLimitMax | sort testStand_iL shortVIN | rename testStand_iL AS Prüfstand shortVIN AS FGNR wheelAlignmentCode AS Spurcode shortResultName AS Ergebnisname outlierR AS "Rama (R)" outlierAwL AS "Linie (L)" outlierAwDiff AS "Diff_L-R" outlierAwValues AS "Diff_L-R_n" outlierAwDiffValues AS "Abstand" outlierRange AS "Bereich" outlierAwCntUG AS "Anz zu niedrig" outlierAwCntOG AS "Anz zu hoch" outlierOverall AS "gesamt Ausreißer" outlierLimitMax AS "max Ausreißer" cnt_AW_Linie AS "Anz L" cnt_AW_Rama AS "Anz R"

| loadjob $jobid$ | where IS_AW_OUT=1 AND (IS_REF=0 AND IS_VE=0) AND testStand_iL="$testStand$" AND shortResultName="$resultName$" AND hinterTestStand="$hinterTestStand$" | eval outlierRange=outlierUg + " ≤ Δ ≤ " + outlierOg, outlierLimitMax=cnt_AW_Rama-outlierAwLimit, outlierOverall=outlierAwCntUG+outlierAwCntOG | table hinterTestStand testStand_iL shortVIN wheelAlignmentCode shortResultName outlierAwL cnt_AW_Linie outlierR cnt_AW_Rama outlierAwDiff outlierAwValues outlierAwDiffValues outlierRange outlierAwCntUG outlierAwCntOG outlierOverall outlierLimitMax | sort hinterTestStand testStand_iL shortVIN | rename hinterTestStand AS Hinterachsanlage testStand_iL AS Prüfstand shortVIN AS FGNR wheelAlignmentCode AS Spurcode shortResultName AS Ergebnisname outlierR AS "Rama (R)" outlierAwL AS "Linie (L)" outlierAwDiff AS "Diff_L-R" outlierAwValues AS "Diff_L-R_n" outlierAwDiffValues AS "Abstand" outlierRange AS "Bereich" outlierAwCntUG AS "Anz zu niedrig" outlierAwCntOG AS "Anz zu hoch" outlierOverall AS "gesamt Ausreißer" outlierLimitMax AS "max Ausreißer" cnt_AW_Linie AS "Anz L" cnt_AW_Rama AS "Anz R"
